/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and buses, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Buildings of different sizes and designs flank the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting different parts of the city. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the urban landscape of Beijing.
